publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1094♦ John Wilson: Children in Poverty—That the Parliament expresses its concern about the 1.4 million children in Britain currently living in poverty, including in central Scotland, despite the fact that at least one of their parents is in work, as highlighted in the Institute for Public Policy Research report, Working out of poverty: A study of the low paid and the working poor, and notes that the report also highlights difficulties over the implementation and effectiveness of the National Minimum Wage.
S3M-1094♦ Children in Poverty (lodged on 4 January 2008) Christine Grahame*, Jamie Hepburn*, Michael Matheson*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-1094♦ Children in Poverty (lodged on 4 January 2008) Alex Neil*
